text: Non-classic congenital adrenal hyperplasia due to 21-hydroxylase deficiency ?,"How might non-classic congenital adrenal hyperplasia due to 21-hydroxylase deficiency be treated? In some cases, people affected by non-classic congenital adrenal hyperplasia due to 21-hydroxylase deficiency (NCAH) may not require any treatment.
